thread.title: Boy George speaks of shame at keeping male escort prisoner | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Boy George speaks of shame at keeping male escort prisoner | Daily Mail Online

author: Martin Robinson
title: Boy George speaks of shame at keeping male escort prisoner | Daily Mail Online
text: Singer Boy George reveals he was having a drug-induced 'psychotic episode' when he kept a male escort prisoner in his London flat Boy George cried as he spoke of being jailed for attacking a sex worker at home He chained sex worker Audun Carlsen to wall, whipped him and screamed abuse He said: 'I sent myself to prison. I told the police why I did what I did. In hindsight I was having a psychotic episode' Culture Club singer, 55, also spoke emotionally about feud with George Michael He said: 'Sadly with George, you couldn't get close to him. I know people tried'
